thread.title: Campaign special: Faint praise awards for political mailers
thread.title_full: Campaign special: Faint praise awards for political mailers - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Heather Knight
title: Campaign special: Faint praise awards for political mailers
text:
Photo: Chronicle Graphic Various campaign brochures for the San Francisco ballot in October. Various campaign brochures for the San Francisco ballot in October.
Plenty of people will go to sleep Nov. 3 upset about something related to the city’s contentious election. But we can surely all agree on one pleasant outcome: no more campaign mailers! At least until next year. Various campaign brochures for the San Francisco ballot in October. Various campaign brochures for the San Francisco ballot in October.
